title: Tomba Technology Finder Input
description: Input configuration for Tomba Technology Finder Actor - Retrieve technologies used by a specific domain

tombaApiKey.title: Tomba API Key
tombaApiKey.description: Your Tomba API key (starts with 'ta_'). Get it from https://app.tomba.io/api

tombaApiSecret.title: Tomba API Secret
tombaApiSecret.description: Your Tomba secret key (starts with 'ts_'). Get it from https://app.tomba.io/api

domains.title: Domains
domains.description: Array of domains to discover technologies for (e.g., 'example.com', 'google.com')

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of technology results to return
